channel.title: About on Stefano Huber
channel.description: Recent content in About on Stefano Huber

item.title: About
item.description: About Me Hi, I am Stefano Huber. I am a student of computer science at EPFL, passionate of algorithms, theoretical CS and machine learning. When I am not studying, I like practicing sports: tennis, basketball and riding my mountain bike are my favourite! Education At the moment, I am a master student of computer science at EPFL and previously I have studied computer science at the University of Trento. Before university, I have attended the Scientific High School Galilei Trento, where I have developed my passion for computer science taking part in multiple robotics and coding competitions.

item.title: Contact
